glsa.title: ez-ipupdate: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: ez-ipupdate contains a format string vulnerability that could lead to execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: ez-ipupdate is a utility for updating host name information for a large number of dynamic DNS services.

description.p: Ulf Harnhammar from the Debian Security Audit Project discovered a format string vulnerability in ez-ipupdate.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running ez-ipupdate, which could be the root user.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ez-ipupdate users should upgrade to the latest version:
